form.name: form1

div.span: TCESC Operations During Statewide School Closing

p.span: Although the Trumbull County Educational Service Center is continuing to operate through the mandated statewide school closure, our Central Office is closed to the public as staffing is limited to our administrative team. The remainder of our staff is working remotely. If you need assistance, please call the

and you will be directed to the appropriate individual(s). Our staff remains committed to working with our partnering school districts to serve our students and their families, and the community at large. Thank you for your patience as we all continue to work together through the challenges and changes we are now confronting as a result of COVID-19 (Coronavirus).

div.span: Governing Board Meeting - Online Meeting Information

p.style: margin: 0in 0in 8pt; line-height: 15.6933px; font-size: 11pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif

p.span: Our Curriculum & Instruction Team has designed a great resource with activities your child can work on while at home.
This website will be updated every Friday with new resources by grade level.

p.style: margin: 0in 0in 8pt; line-height: 15.6933px; font-size: 11pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif
margin: 0in 0in 8pt; line-height: 15.6933px; font-size: 11pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif

span.strong: TALKING TO YOUR CHILD ABOUT CORONAVIRUS

p.style: margin: 0in 0in 8pt; line-height: 15.6933px; font-size: 11pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif

span.p: Life as we all know it has rapidly changed the past few weeks as we all continue to cope with growing concerns over Coronavirus (COVID-19).

p.style: margin: 0in 0in 8pt; line-height: 15.6933px; font-size: 11pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif

span.p: Here is a great resource to help open conversations with your child and address their concerns:

p.style: margin: 0in 0in 8pt; line-height: 15.6933px; font-size: 11pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif

a.text-node: How to talk to your kids about Coronavirus

p.style: margin: 0in 0in 8pt; line-height: 15.6933px; font-size: 11pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif

span.span: The Trumbull County Educational Service Center is in need of substitute assistants to work in our classrooms.
